pages.text: The $(e)Lightning Sigil$() acts as a conductor for the primal fury of the skies. It allows the wielder to command the $(b)storm's wrath$() at a mere whim.
By channeling your essence through the plate, you can $(6)summon bolts of pure lightning$() to strike down your foes. No armor can protect them from the searing heat of a celestial strike.
The heavens will roar and the earth will tremble as you $(n)smite$() those who dare to stand in your path. With this sigil, you are the $(e)storm$().
